verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Where, where could I run
Where could I hide
That you're not there
And you, you know my heart
All of my thoughts you understand

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: I can't outrun your love, I can't outrun your love

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
You love me when I'm up, You love me when I'm down
Your love it surrounds me, I can't get away
You love me when I'm lost, You love me till I'm found
Your love ir surrounds me, I can't get away

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
You, You see my mess
All my mistakes
And you love me till
And though, though I may waver
I am convinced
That you never changed

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines:
I've been to the bottom, I've been to the top
I can't runaway, Your love will never stop
With me in the morning and the dead of night
You're not leaving
So I'm not leaving
